Messages.unsupportedPlatform: Connecting to Ryze Tello Drone is not supported on Linux
Messages.spkgNotInstalled: This app needs the MATLAB® Support Package for Ryze® Tello Drones. Open Add-On Explorer to install the required support package.
Messages.invalidDuration: Record duration must be a finite positive numeric value greater than 1
Messages.invalidRecordingVarName: Specify a valid MATLAB variable name
Messages.variableAlreadyExists: Specified variable name already exists in the MATLAB workspace
Messages.lowBatteryWarning: Low battery, consider landing the drone
Messages.lowBatteryDroneLandedWarning: Low battery, consider replacing the batteries
Messages.appClosingMsg: Exit the Ryze Tello Navigator app?
Messages.preFlightCheckButtonDescription: Run pre-flight checks for selected drone
Messages.controlsButtonDescription: Show/Hide control buttons for manual navigation
Messages.cameraFeedButtonDescription: Enable/Disable live feed from drone’s camera
Messages.captureImageButtonDescription: Capture an instantaneous image to Workspace
Messages.logToWorkSpaceDescription: Workspace variable to store recorded video
Messages.startRecordingButtonDescription: Start video recording from drone’s camera
Messages.stopRecordingButtonDescription: Stop video recording and save to Workspace variable as an image array
Messages.codegenButtonDescription: Generate Live Editor script of completed navigation when drone is in landed state
Messages.heightTooltip: Current height relative to the takeoff surface
Messages.preFlightCheckWarningText: Ensure that the drone is placed in a safe environment. You will not be able to control the drone while Pre-Flight Check is in progress.
Messages.preFlightCheckSuccessLabel: Pre-Flight Check completed successsfully. Click OK to Finish.
Messages.preFlightCheckFailureLabel: Possible issues in Pre-Flight Check. Try manually troubleshooting the drone connection. Click OK to Finish.
Messages.distanceSettingDescription: Specify the distance Tello drone will navigate.
Messages.turnSettingDescription: Specify the angle Tello drone will turn by.
Messages.speedSettingDescription: Specify how fast the Tello drone will navigate.
Messages.emergencyLandDialogText: Emergency Land will shut off the Tello drone motors causing it to fall to the ground from the current height.
Messages.scriptTitle: Auto-generated by Ryze Tello Navigator App on .
Messages.introSectionComment: This script is usable outside of the Ryze Tello Navigator to replicate its actions. The script demonstrates the MATLAB® command line workflow using functions provided in the MATLAB® Support Package for Ryze® Tello Drones. You can modify it to build your own script, function, or application.
Messages.createRyzeObjectSectionHeader: Create a Ryze Tello drone and Camera Connection
Messages.createRyzeObjectSectionComment: Create a Ryze Tello drone connection using the specified device ID. Create a connection to the drone camera
Messages.navigationSectionComment: Navigate Ryze Tello Drone and capture images using MATLAB Support Package for Ryze Tello Drones APIs
Messages.recordingSectionComment: Uncomment the lines of code below to record the data for the specified duration into a workspace variable.
Messages.cleanUpSectionComment: Clear variables that are not needed.
Messages.reconnectLabelText: Connection to Tello Drone is lost, check Wi-Fi connecton and try again.
